title: Bollywood Actresses Who Married Within The Film Fraternity But Not Actors

persons.name: roop ki rani choron ka raja

text:
facebook 254 SHARES 
Actors getting married to actresses is a common phenomenon. At the moment, there are so many co-stars dating (some more serious than others). But do you know about actresses who found love on the movie sets ... but not with the lead actors. Wondering who we are talking about? Check out the list below. Sridevi and Boney Kapoor 
The actress who had millions of fans dying to marry her, found love with the Bollywood movie producer (and Anil Kapoor's older brother) Boney Kapoor. Boney and Sridevi have worked together in films like Mr. India and Roop Ki Rani Choron Ka Raja . The two dated for a brief period before saying â€˜I do'. They have two gorgeous daughters, Jhanvi and Khushi. Vidya Balan and Sidharth Roy Kapoor 
In an intimate ceremony, actress Vidya Balan got married to producer Siddharth Roy Kapoor. The two had met at a Filmfare event and hit it off instantly. Vidya and Siddharth have been happily married since 2012. Rakhee and Gulzar 
Ace lyricist Gulzar married superstar actress Rakhee in the year the year 1973 although they separated after a year of marriage. They have a daughter together, Meghna Gulzar, who is a popular writer. Kalki Koechlin and Anurag Kashyap 
Kalki started her acting career with Anurag's Dev D . The two were often spotted together, and rumours started pouring in that they were seeing each other. Later, Kalki admitted to dating Anurag and they got married in the year 2011. Sadly, they got divorced in 2015. Mohit Suri and Udita Goswami 
Udita was the leading actress in the film Zeher which, was directed by Mohit Suri. Soon, the two started dating. The relationship was on and off for a long time and finally, the couple got married in the year 2013. The two have a daughter named, Devi. Rani Mukerji and Aditya Chopra 
For years, there was buzz of actress Rani Mukerji dating director-producer Aditya Chopra. But the two never formally confirmed their relationship. In 2014, the two secretly got married in Italy and left everyone surprised and in 2015, they had a daughter, Adira. Photo Credit: BCCL
